intro: Rudgea psychotriifolia, commonly known as the psychotriifolia rudgea, is a species of flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in tropical and subtropical regions. Due to its unique appearance and habitat, it is of interest to botanists and plant enthusiasts.
